item_1.value: Poker study for everyone, beginners to elite
Looks like a perfect tool to study. Makes it fun while giving good information.

item_2.value: It's an incredible poker learning tool. And fun as well!

item_3.value: First time I've enjoyed studying. This is 10x more fun than 'practicing' online!

item_4.value: Love, love, LOVE Octopi! Thanks to the entire team for creating it!

item_5.value: The use of the Trainer alone would have been a steal at twice the price!

item_6.value: I've used other Trainers before, but Octopi makes the most sense to me - so intuitive!

item_7.value: Octopi is the best value GTO study tool on the market and what I use to improve my game.

item_8.value: Cutting-edge and a game-changer. Its vibrant community fosters growth where improvement is fun.

item_9.value: As a coach, I use Octopi Vault to review final tables with sims. It's an awesome resource; I strongly recommend!

item_10.value: Octopi Poker has helped me transform the way I study. I love instant feedback on how to play as optimally as possible.

item_11.value: Studying a GAME shouldn't ever be daunting or stressful. Octopi solves both those issues and makes studying the game itself fun!

item_12.value: It's not a coincidence that my best year of poker coincides with subscription to Octopi.

item_13.value: Absolutely brilliant poker study tool! And superb support team!

item_14.value: I love drilling against the trainer, especially for ICM FT spots - it's fun and builds confidence in high-stakes spots where I lack experience.

item_15.value: Octopi Poker creates and reinforces the right feedback loops for poker decision-making, and it's fun!

item_2.value: Embrace your inner octopus and proudly wear the exclusive Octopi merch. Elegant and comfortable, it is made for grinders like you.
Direct access to best poker coaches for every game, skill level and price point.
Relive the excitement of high-stakes poker from Triton, PokerGO, WSOP and more. Over 18K hands and 2k preflop and postflop ICM sims to explore in both live play and HH replayer format.

item_3.value: Or, put your skills to the test with our immersive trainer experience and compare your plays to those of the real players along with the AI solutions.
